H0.text: In June 1991, which late US President was exhumed to test whether his death was caused by arsenic poisoning and not gastrointestinal illness. Abraham Lincoln

H1.text: In June 1991, which late US President was exhumed to test whether his death was caused by arsenic poisoning and not gastrointestinal illness. James Garfield

H2.text: In June 1991, which late US President was exhumed to test whether his death was caused by arsenic poisoning and not gastrointestinal illness. William Henry Harrison

H3.text: In June 1991, which late US President was exhumed to test whether his death was caused by arsenic poisoning and not gastrointestinal illness. Zach Taylor

A4.text: The remains were exhumed and transported to the Office of the Kentucky Chief Medical Examiner on June 17, 1991.

A5.text: Samples of hair, fingernail, and other tissues were removed, and radiological studies were conducted.
